title: 3 Bedroom Luxury Townhome for Rent in East Montrose!
posting_body: ['118 Drew St  Houston, TX  77006', '$2950.00 / Month', '---------------------------', 'Interested in this property?', 'Reply to this listing for more information.', '---------------------------', 'Property Details:', '3 BEDROOMS | 3.5 BATHROOMS', 'Newly renovated with top-of-the-line 2022 appliances, chef’s kitchen, & a floorpan that maximizes space & light, this well-appointed townhome inside a fully gated community has its own attached 2 car garage & private, fenced back patio.', 'Nest Thermostat & Ring doorbell included!Ideal location nestled between Midtown & Montrose — surrounded by quiet, tree-lined streets.', 'One of the highest walkability scores in Houston (91%), a 5 minute stroll from Whole Foods, Specs, & more than 50 restaurants, coffee shops, & nightlife including the new Montrose Collective luxury shopping district, & a 10 minute walk to the Metro Rail!All 3 bedrooms have their own spacious private baths, large closets, & new ceiling fans.', 'The master bedroom also has double vanities, a separate spa tub & glass-enclosure rain shower, as well as 2 oversized walk-in closets.', 'Additionally, the laundry room has a brand new, high quality washer and dryer & the home is floored in hardwood & tile — no carpet to deal with!', '***Cats, Small Dogs Allowed***', 'Property Type:', 'Townhouse', 'Lease Terms:', '$2950.00/Month', '$2950.00 Deposit', 'Lease Length:', 'One Year', 'Available:', '09/01/2022', 'Unit Amenities:', 'Dishwasher', 'Dryer', 'Freezer', 'Oven', 'Microwave', 'Garbage Disposal', 'Refrigerator', 'Washer', 'Building Amenities:', 'Alarm System', 'Cable Ready', 'Fenced Yard', 'Fireplace', 'Near Parks', 'Garage', 'Off Street Parking', 'On Site Laundry', 'Secure Building', 'Security Cameras', 'Wired For Internet', '---------------------------', 'Interested in this property?', 'Reply to this listing for more information.']
